name: A Date With Tonpa
description:
You're the lucky person that gets to go on a Date with Tonpa !! You meet at the dump, and the story continues from there ;)  Warning: there are a couple self-inserts, but overall its mostly immersive. Inspired by the Leorio Dating Simulator. There also may be more routes added in the future depending on what people want.

Description:

  • Very crappy
  • Very fun
  • Very stupid
  • Very bad photoshopping

Dateable characters:

  • Jumin
  • Rodrick
  • Levi
  • Rin
  • Haru
  • Mitsurugi
  • Wamu
